title: Where can I find this...
content:
Hello everybody. This is a sample of Halaal by Sheila Dorje of Orange Juice Design in South Africa. I can’t seem to find it available for purchase anywhere. Any ideas?  
Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202185356im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/HALAAL_4335.jpg)

 [‹ New Globe and Mail today](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202185356/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33247 "Go to previous forum topic") [Great site with tons of old posters ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202185356/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36444 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jonbruns

comments.content: If you’re willing to try another faux arabic typeface there’s always [FF Levant](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202185356/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_levant/).
